preset_modes: 18 preset modes (e.g. snow, close-up, soft skin)
ISO: up to 6400 ISO with little noise

color: silver, red, blue, black, or purple
effects: 18 glamor retouch effects (vivid, soft focus, toy camera, etc.)
13 creative mode settings (lighter or darker skin tones, toy camera, skin softening, etc.)
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
